samples.context: Symptoms of disease and signs appear. These symptoms may be headache, cough, loose-motions, wound with pus, etc.
samples.question: What are common symptoms of disease?

samples.context: These symptoms indicate disease but do not tell what the disease is.
samples.question: What do these symptoms indicate?

samples.context: It is advisable to go to the doctor to diagnose any signs of a disease on the basis of these symptoms.
samples.question: Why should you visit a doctor?

samples.context: The doctor will get laboratory tests done, if required for the confirmation of a particular disease.
samples.question: What will a doctor do for disease confirmation?

samples.context: Symptoms of disease and signs appear. These symptoms may be headache, cough, loose-motions, wound with pus, etc.
samples.question: Name one symptom that indicates illness.
